Title: Enacts the "Electric Super Highway Act of 2021"
Summary: Enacts the "electric super highway act", requiring alternative fuels to be available for public use along the New York state thruway after November 1, 2021 and providing each recommended alternative fuel at least every one hundred twenty miles on both sides of the thruway; defines "alternative fuel".
LawCode: Amd ยง1-103, add ยง5-129, Energy L; amd ยง354, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law and the public authorities law, in relation to the availability of alternative fuels along the New York state thruway
